name: Reading League Racing
description:
Created as an example for students of Core Systems Studio Games Fa2021

This is the first of 4 System Game Prototypes meant to be made by students. The prompt was "Physics!!" Students have two weeks to create a game inspired by systems thinking.

The WebGL build does not scale the ui correctly, but otherwise works!

After the text scrolls for too long without a letter being read, the GAME OVER will appear.
